meanings.definition: In a foolish or stubborn manner
meanings.sent1: He fatheadedly refused to listen to any advice.
meanings.sent2: She walked fatheadedly into the trap without hesitation.
meanings.sent3: The cat fatheadedly chased its own tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The car fatheadedly drove straight into the dead-end street.
meanings.sent5: The child fatheadedly touched the hot stove despite warnings.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of intelligence or understanding
meanings.sent1: His fatheadedly decision led to disastrous consequences.
meanings.sent2: The fatheadedly student struggled to grasp the basic concepts.
meanings.sent3: The fatheadedly puppy kept running into walls.
meanings.sent4: The fatheadedly plan fell apart before it even began.
meanings.sent5: The fatheadedly mistake cost him his job.

meanings.definition: Acting in a thick-headed or obtuse way
meanings.sent1: The fatheadedly man couldn't understand simple instructions.
meanings.sent2: She gave a fatheadedly response to the teacher's question.
meanings.sent3: The fatheadedly team kept making the same mistakes.
meanings.sent4: His fatheadedly behavior alienated his friends.
meanings.sent5: The fatheadedly decision left everyone puzzled.
